babai_graph_2016.long: L. Babai, “Graph Isomorphism in Quasipolynomial Time [Extended Abstract],” in Proceedings of the Forty-Eighth Annual ACM Symposium on Theory of Computing, in STOC ’16. New York, NY, USA: Association for Computing Machinery, 2016, pp. 684–697. doi: 10.1145/2897518.2897542

dvorak_recognizing_2010.long: Z. Dvořák, “On recognizing graphs by numbers of homomorphisms,” J. Graph Theory, vol. 64, no. 4, pp. 330–342, Aug. 2010, doi: 10.1002/jgt.20461
